alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:12PM CDT until June 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1211 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Lincoln, or 10 miles southwest of Brookhaven, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Center Point around 1220 PM CDT. Bogue Chitto around 1225 PM CDT. Ruth around 1240 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
